name: Tokyo Ghoul: Break the Chains
storyline:
In Tokyo, a group of monsters called “ghouls” live here. They lurk in the crowd and hunt people. Kaneki Ken, who loves reading, met a certain woman in the "Anting District" of the cafe he frequented. The two people, who have the same age, circumstances and reading interests, gradually become closer, but... After the bookstore date, Kaneki Ken was involved in an accident that changed his fate and was forced to do so will transplant the organs of a "ghoul"... ...

While Kaneki Ken was confused and entangled in this twisted world, he found himself caught up in a series of vicious circles from which he could not escape.
summary:
The timing of the special move and the combination of characters are the key to victory or defeat! Strategic factors such as the order of skill execution and the timing of activation of special moves can also change the situation of the battle!

It features a plot “tangled between humans and ghouls”, a dungeon system that can be enjoyed by a single player, a co-battle system that allows you to fight side by side with other players , real-time PVP battles, etc. It's full of playable content!
